text: Broadway to Oz was a 2015 concert tour by Australian actor, musician and dancer Hugh Jackman. He performed Broadway and Hollywood musical numbers backed by a company of 150 musicians and dancers. The concert show was produced by Dainty Group and Robert Fox Ltd. The show started in Melbourne on 24 November 2015, touring through Sydney, Brisbane and Adelaide, before closing in Perth on 15 December, 2015. ==Tour dates== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of concerts, showing date, city, country, and venueHugh Jackman LiveHugh Jackman Announces Broadway to Oz Australian Arena Tour |- ! scope="col" style="width:12em;"| Date ! scope="col" style="width:10em;"| City ! scope="col" style="width:10em;"| Country ! scope="col" style="width:16em;"| Venue |- |23 November 2015 |rowspan="4"|Melbourne |rowspan="16"|Australia |rowspan="4"|Rod Laver Arena |- |24 November 2015 |- |25 November 2015 |- |26 November 2015 |- |30 November 2015 |rowspan="4"|Sydney |rowspan="4"|Qantas Credit Union Arena |- |1 December 2015 |- |2 December 2015 |- |3 December 2015 |- |5 December 2015 |rowspan="2"|Brisbane |rowspan="2"|Brisbane Entertainment Centre |- |6 December 2015 |- |10 December 2015 |rowspan="3"|Adelaide |rowspan="3"|Adelaide Entertainment Centre |- |11 December 2015 |- |12 December 2015 |- |15 December 2015 |rowspan="2"|Perth |rowspan="2"|Perth Arena |- |16 December 2015 |} ==References== Category:2015 concert tours Category:Hugh Jackman
